torch_mist

  • torch_mist.estimators.base

Source code for torch_mist.estimators.base

from abc import abstractmethod

import torch
import torch.nn as nn



[docs]class MutualInformationEstimator(nn.Module):

[docs]    @abstractmethod
    def log_ratio(self, x: torch.Tensor, y: torch.Tensor) -> torch.Tensor:
        raise NotImplementedError()



[docs]    def expected_log_ratio(self, x: torch.Tensor, y: torch.Tensor) -> torch.Tensor:
        return self.log_ratio(x, y).mean()



[docs]    def unnormalized_log_ratio(self, x: torch.Tensor, y: torch.Tensor) -> torch.Tensor:
        return self.log_ratio(x, y)



[docs]    @abstractmethod
    def loss(self, x: torch.Tensor, y: torch.Tensor) -> torch.Tensor:
        raise NotImplementedError()



[docs]    def forward(self, x: torch.Tensor, y: torch.Tensor) -> torch.Tensor:
        """
            Compute an estimation for I(x,y).
            Args:
               x: a tensor with shape [N, D] in which x[i] is sampled from p(x)
               y: a tensor with shape [N, D] in which y[i] is sampled from p(y|x[i])
            Returns:
               estimation: the expected (weighted) log ratio
        """
        return self.expected_log_ratio(x, y)
